definition: taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
meaning/implication/flavor/overtone/to mean/to imply/(Tw) to get a sense of
to sample/to taste/to appreciate/one's taste (i.e. in music, literature, fashion, food and drink etc)/good taste
implicit charm in rhyme or sound/hinted appeal/interest

sentences.english: Amazing Grass, Kidz Super Food, Outrageous Chocolate Flavor, 200g.
sentences.chinese: 儿童超级食物补充，无法抗拒的巧克力味，200克。

sentences.english: For me, reading about chemo brain has resurrected that faint taste of metal.
sentences.chinese: 对我而言，读到化疗脑使我重新想起了金属味。

sentences.english: Ample and complex on the palate. It reveals fresh and generous fruit.
sentences.chinese: 口感饱满复杂，带有浓郁的新鲜水果味。

sentences.english: Fanta is a tasty orange-flavored drink that was originally designed specifically for the Nazis.
sentences.chinese: 芬达最初是专门为纳粹设计的美味的桔子味饮料。

sentences.english: Others only looked at the soap or sniffed it.
sentences.chinese: 其他人只能看着肥皂泡或闻着肥皂味。

sentences.english: December rabbit meat is characterized by tender meat and delicious food are not Seya, preserved meat full.
sentences.chinese: 腊兔肉的特点是肉嫩味美，食不塞牙，腊味十足。

sentences.english: Salt is good, but if it loses its saltiness, how can you make it salty again?
sentences.chinese: 盐本是好的，若失了味，可用什么叫它再咸呢？

sentences.english: Objective The in situ hybridization method was used with signal amplification system for detecting G-protein expression in taste buds.
sentences.chinese: 目的利用原位杂交检测味细胞中G蛋白的表达。

sentences.english: Teresa was also very big in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 的确还是小邓唱的到味。

sentences.english: Firstly with almond aroma, full with intense and lovely peach aroma.
sentences.chinese: 入口杏仁味和白桃果味丰厚，活泼可喜，酸度充足。

sentences.english: A slight char is also apparent, creating a very enticing aroma.
sentences.chinese: 一种轻微的焦糊味创造了诱人的香味。

sentences.english: You are the salt of the earth, but if the salt loses its savor, with what shall it be salted?
sentences.chinese: 你们是世上的盐。盐若失了味，怎能叫他再咸呢？

sentences.english: The butter is the fat which in the milk refines, the color and the taste similar edible butter.
sentences.chinese: 酥油是牛奶中提炼出来的脂肪，色与味类似食用黄油。

sentences.english: He smelled of horses and dogs and blood and leather.
sentences.chinese: 他一身马和狗的味道，还有血和皮革味。

sentences.english: I smelt the fragrance of fresh strawberries .
sentences.chinese: 我闻到了一股新鲜的草莓味。

sentences.english: Salt is good: but if the salt have lost his savour, wherewith shall it be seasoned?
sentences.chinese: 盐本来是好的，但如果失了味，怎能使它再咸呢？

definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
